metadata.title: CVE-2024-43885 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: fix double inode unlock for direct IO sync writesIf we do a direct IO sync write, at btrfs_sync_file(), and we need to skipinode logging or we get an error starting a transaction or an error whenflushing delalloc, we end up unlocking the inode when we shouldn't underthe 'out_release_extents' label, and then unlock it again atbtrfs_direct_write().Fix that by checking if we have to skip inode unlocking under that label.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
